commit_list.repo_description: iOS app where player solves mazes. Based on PragProg Maze book by Jamis Buck

commit_list.message:
Calculate distance using Djikstra's algorithm from the starting point to each accessible face.
Several properties and methods need to be reorganized.
Maze image rendering can be given a path, which will be rendered in yellow.

rename faceAdjacentToFace:inDirection to neighborForFace:inDirection

both changes are to match terminology in Redblob grid article.
